Articles.Content:
Hey Kspers

My name is DRaffie88 and most of you won't know me.

I like to make different space planes and test out designs here and there. Today I made on of my favourite fighter/cruiser's ever in ksp. Its called the Omega and it is influenced by Macey Deans different crafts. It is completely stock and has functioning weaponry. I sadly cannot give a craft file as I still have to run on proper 1.0 because I am unable to update the game BUT I have a small gif showing how it runs and the small different aesthetics of the craft. All parts on the craft are removable and reloadable with the little tug that is attached to the center missiles. The craft can fly with or without and of the weapon parts and is fully defended. It can withstand multiple shots from all the weaponry I have tested (Except 1m solid fuel rockets as they are hard to work) and the wings protect it from several shots.

I have spent lots of work on this craft trying to balance it out and all. Once 1.0.5 comes out I should be able to update and I will provide a craft file. If you wanna see a previous build of mine check out this video that Guard13007 made reviewing my craft.

My craft review starts at 8:27

Thanks for reading and I hope you all Like my planes! Make sure to follow me for future builds!
